short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use your past moments to better the next

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remember when that twelve year old thanked you for being a great role model? Remember when you were so sure of your abilities, yet you lost the competition? The overwhelming sense of accomplishment that made you feel as if nothing could stop you. How disappointed you were in yourself and the swearing of redemption. Don't forget these sparks of passion and emotion. 

Moment is created to assist you in reaching your goals and encourage the pursuit of passion. Record your own goals, personal struggles and successes, and inspirational quotes in Moment and it will remind you of them throughout the day.
